docs.lead_paragraph: Asserting that Ireland must restore international confidence in its debt-laden economy, Finance Minister Brian Lenihan announced an emergency budget plan Tuesday that included creation of a so-called bad bank to buy problem loans from Irish lenders, along with higher taxes and lower government spending to try to bring the deficit in line.

headline.main: Ireland's Emergency Budget Includes Help for Banks

docs.abstract: Asserting that Ireland must restore international confidence in its debt-laden economy, Finance Minister Brian Lenihan announced an emergency budget plan Tuesday that included creation of a so-called bad bank to buy problem loans from Irish lenders, along with higher taxes and lower government spending to try to bring the deficit in line. The measures announced [...]

docs.lead_paragraph: All insurers should enable customers to determine, in advance, how much they will have to pay for services outside their network.

docs.lead_paragraph: The recession has made the challenges of life after foster care even more formidable, especially for those seeking federal housing vouchers, which are contingent on having an income.

docs.lead_paragraph: Lewisburg, Tenn., like hundreds of small cities, is reeling from reliance on risky bond derivatives that went bad.
